craf.name: AdaptiveHelm
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 15 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 10 Mana after casting.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 5% more damage for 8 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 7% max health.

Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craf.name: Crownguard
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain a 25% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 25 Ability Power.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

craf.name: Evenshroud
craf.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 15 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craf.name: Fimbulwinter
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Gain 15% Damage Amp against enemies with more than 1750 max Health.

craf.name: Guardbreaker
craf.add_attrs: After damaging a Shield, gain 15% Damage Amp for 3 seconds.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
- 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
- 12% Omnivamp

Attack Damage and Ability Power are doubled above 50% health, and Omnivamp is doubled below 50% health

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: Heal the lowest percent Health ally for 25% of damage dealt.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of the Mana spent.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: +55% Attack Damage

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: NashorsTooth
craf.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds. During this time, gain 3% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: +50 Ability Power, +15% Damage Amp

craf.name: RedBuffItem
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also gain 10% Durability for 5 seconds (this does not stack).

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Attacks fire a bolt at a neaby enemy, dealing 60% Attack Damage as physical damage.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack deal 35 magic damage and 30% Shreds 4 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: SteadfastHeart
craf.add_attrs: Gain 8% Durability. While above 50% Health, instead gain 15% Durability.

craf.name: SteraksGage
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 25% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Gain 12% max health.

embl.name: SniperEmblem

arti.name: BlacksmithsGloves
arti.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

arti.name: BlightingJewel
arti.add_attrs: Dealing magic damage reduces the target's Magic Resist by 4. If their Magic Resist is 0, grant the holder 5 Mana instead.

arti.name: DeathfireGrasp
arti.add_attrs:
Combat start: Blast the current target for 40% of their max Health as magic damage. Repeat this every 13 seconds.

For the next 10 seconds, gain 25% Damage Amp. Against the blasted target this is increased to 35%.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: Fishbones
arti.add_attrs: Doubles the holder's attack range, and causes each of their attacks to target a random enemy.

arti.name: GamblersBlade
arti.add_attrs:
Grant 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 30 gold).

Each attack has a 5% chance to drop 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: HorizonFocus
arti.add_attrs: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage.

arti.name: Hullcrusher
arti.add_attrs: Combat start: If there are no adjacent allies, gain 600 Health, 20% Attack Damage, and 20 Ability Power.

arti.name: InnervatingLocket
arti.add_attrs:
The holder gains 2% of their total Mana whenever they're hit by an attack.

Each cast restores 20% of the holder's max Health over 3 seconds.

arti.name: LichBane
arti.add_attrs:
The holder's first attack after each Ability cast deals 200-480 bonus magic damage.

Damage increases based on Stage.

arti.name: LightshieldCrest
arti.add_attrs:
Every 3 seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for 55% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds.

On death grants this shield to all allies.

arti.name: LudensTempest
arti.add_attrs: 100% of overkill damage plus 100 is dealt as magic damage to the three enemies nearest the target.

arti.name: Mittens
arti.add_attrs:
Shrinks the holder, granting them increased movement speed and immunity to Chill.

Chill: reduce Attack Speed

arti.name: MogulsMail
arti.add_attrs:
Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 7 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 35 times.

At full stacks, grant 1 gold and continue gaining 1 gold every 8 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemDeathsDance
arti.add_attrs:
50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemMuramana
arti.add_attrs:
After casting the first time in combat, gain 120 Mana over 5 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemSpiritVisage
arti.add_attrs: Heal 3.5% max health every second.

arti.name: OrnnItemTheCollector
arti.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their max Health. Executions have a 33% chance to drop 1 gold .

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTrinityForce
arti.add_attrs: Health +250, Mana +25, Attack Damage +25%, Ability Power +25, Armor +25, Magic Resist +25, Attack Speed +25%

arti.name: OrnnItemZhonyasHourglass
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 40% Health, become invulnerable for 3 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: ProwlersClaw
arti.add_attrs: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within 4 hexes. The next 2 critical attacks deal 60% bonus Critical Strike Damage.

arti.name: RapidFirecannon
arti.add_attrs: Gain +1 Attack Range, increased by 1 whenever the holder kills an enemy.

arti.name: SeekersArmguard
arti.add_attrs: Takedowns increase the holder's Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power by 15, increased to 20 if they score the kill.

arti.name: SilvermereDawn
arti.add_attrs:
Grants immunity to Stuns and the holder's attacks Stun the target for 0.8 seconds.

The holder's Attack Speed is locked at 0.5.

arti.name: SnipersFocus
arti.add_attrs: Gain +2 Attack Range. Gain 9% Damage Amp against a target for each hex between the holder and the target.

arti.name: SpectralCutlass
arti.add_attrs: Combat start: Teleport the holder to the mirrored hex on the enemy's side of the board. After 8 seconds, the holder returns to their original location.

arti.name: SuspiciousTrenchCoat
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat at 66% Health, the holder splits into 3 copies of themself each with 25% of their max Health.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: TalismanOfAscension
arti.add_attrs: After 22 seconds gain 100% max Health and 120% increased damage for the rest of combat.

arti.name: TrickstersGlass
arti.add_attrs:
Summon a clone with 70% maximum Health and 10% increased max Mana. You cannot equip items to the clone.

The clone benefits from active traits.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: UnendingDespair
arti.add_attrs: Whenever a Shield on the holder breaks, 150% of that Shield's initial value is dealt to the nearest enemy as magic damage.

arti.name: WitsEnd
arti.add_attrs:
Attacks deal 42-100 bonus magic damage.

Heals the holder for 35% of all magic damage dealt.

Damage increases based on Stage.

supp.name: AccomplicesGloves
supp.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

supp.name: AegisoftheLegion
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 25% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: BansheesVeil
supp.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Grant the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row immunity to crowd control and 25% Attack Speed for 18 seconds

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]

supp.name: Chalice
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power and 10 Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]

supp.name: KnightsVow
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 200 Health and 15% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: The holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 250 Shield, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist for 20 seconds.

[Support Item]

supp.name: MoonstoneRenewer
supp.add_attrs:
Every 4 seconds, grant a 55-325 Shield (based on Stage) to the 2 lowest percent health allies for 4 seconds.

[Support item]

supp.name: NeedlesslyBigGem
supp.add_attrs:
Your team deals 5% bonus damage. Each second the holder is alive, your team deals an additional 1% bonus damage, up to a total of 20%.

[Support item]

supp.name: OrnnItemBlackCleaver
supp.add_attrs:
Damage dealt 30% Shreds and 30% Sunders enemies for 15 seconds.

Your team gains 8% Attack Damage and 8 Ability Power.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor

supp.name: OrnnItemRanduinsOmen
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

[Support item]

supp.name: Shroud
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Shoot a beam that 30% Mana Reaves enemies.

Your team gains 60 Health.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast

supp.name: Spite
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: The holder and all adjacent allies gain 15 Attack Damage and 20 Ability Power.

When the holder dies, Stun all enemies within 2-hexes for 2 seconds.

[Support item]

supp.name: TheEternalFlame
supp.add_attrs:
While the holder is alive, all enemies are 33% Wounded and all allies deal 8% Damage Amp. This effect refreshes every 5 seconds.

​​[Support item]
Wound: Reduces healing received

supp.name: UnstableTreasureChest
supp.add_attrs:
When the holder dies, the 4 closest allies gain a temporary completed item.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: VirtueoftheMartyr
supp.add_attrs:
Every 5 seconds, heal your team for 7% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to 14% max Health for 2 extra heals.

[Support item]

supp.name: ZekesHerald
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]

supp.name: Zephyr
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

Your team gains 2% Attack Speed.

[Support item]
[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

supp.name: ZzRotPortal
supp.add_attrs:
Summon a large Voidspawn. Its strength increases with each Stage.

[Support item]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

spec.name: ForceofNature
spec.attrs:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold when you win combat.

"...the Heart of a hero..."

spec.name: TacticiansCape
spec.attrs:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold after 10 seconds of combat.

"...and a bit of Luck."

spec.name: TacticiansShield
spec.attrs:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold when the holder dies.

"Imbued with a Philosopher's wisdom..."
